name: Heroic High II: Sterilization of NYC
name_original: Heroic High II: Sterilization of NYC
description: Play the character  'X-YRAM'  to experience a trip to New York City like no other. After being selected to join Heroic High, a school for the supernatural, X-YRAM relocates to NYC.  When she gets there...things not what she expected. X-YRAM is faced with going against everything she believed, to save everything she knows...
